content: the heel st k1 gauge flap place these on one needle to be worked row 2 ws sl 1 work in pattern to last 32 sts and 44 row = 4 / 10 cm in back and forth the remaining stitches are the st p1 stockinette stitch instep and will be used later repeat last 2 row 10 11 12 13 14 times to save time and to ensure accurate at this point decide which style heel you continuing established pattern down heel flap sizing check gauge would like the more traditional and sturdy sizes 5 ¾ and 7 ¼ / 14 5 and slipped stitch or the stretchier and decorative 18 5 cm only cabled heel which is a continuation of the leg next row rs sl 1 k2tog work in pattern stitch pattern to last 3 sts ssk k1 - 28 - 36 - sts © 2011 twistcollective com judy kaethler photography jane heller all rights reserved for personal use only v03 25 11 parade 2 sizes 5 6 ½ and 8 ¼ / 12 5 16 5 32 36 40 sts from the instep in established and 21 cm only pattern pick up and knit 16 19 19 21 21 next row rs sl 1 work in pattern to last sts along the left side of the heel one in the abbreviations st k1 corner and one in each chain stitch knit half the heel sts this is now the turning the heel beginning of round 70 82 88 98 104 sts co cast on all sizes pick up gusset stitches for row 1 ws sl 1 p13 15 17 19 21 p2tog k knit cabled heel p1 turn pick up and knit 13 15 15 17 17 sts along row 2 rs sl 1 k5 ssk k1 turn k2tog knit two together right- the right side of the heel flap one stitch row 3 sl 1 purl to 1 st before the gap slanting decrease in each chain stitch created by the slipped created by the previous turn p2tog p1 turn stitches at the beginning of the row and one row 4 sl 1 knit to 1 st before the gap m1 make 1 stitch insert left additional stitch in the corner between the heel needle from front to created by the previous turn ssk k1 turn flap and the instep stitches work the 24 28 back under strand of repeat row 3 and 4 until all sts have been 32 36 40 sts from the instep in established yarn which runs between worked the last 2 row will end with p2tog pattern pick up and knit 13 15 15 17 17 next stitch on left needle and ssk respectively 14 16 18 20 22 sts sts along the left side of the heel one in the and last stitch on right remain corner and one in each chain stitch needle knit this stitch divide heel sts evenly between two needles knit half the heel sts
